++ Order of the Gauntlet

A division of the marines whose members are strong individuals that choose to work solo instead of with a band of fellow [Marines]

Members are given the priviledge to wander as they see fit to take justice into their own hands, symbolized by a Gauntlet.
-they may have meals at Marine outposts, embassys, and HQ
-they may take advantage of any information or reports needed.
-+1 Repor with all marines
-free passage aboard Marine vessels

[Luth] - executes the Order of Gauntlet physical exams
[Letho]- Massive 7-foot tall man
